mapper.select: select ord_cd, o.cli_cd, c.cli_nm, ord_date, ord_d_date, e.emp_cd, e.emp_nm from orders o join client c on o.cli_cd=c.cli_cd join employee e on o.emp_cd=e.emp_cd order by ord_cd limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select max(cast(substring(ord_cd,9,3) as unsigned)) from orders where ord_date=#{ord_date}

select o.ord_cd, c.cli_nm, ord_date, e.emp_nm, p.prod_cd, p.prod_nm, p.prod_unit, o.ord_d_date, o.ord_count, s.ship_count from orders o join product p on o.prod_cd=p.prod_cd join client c on p.cli_cd=c.cli_cd join employee e on o.emp_cd=e.emp_cd left join ship s on o.ord_cd=s.ord_cd where c.cli_cd=#{cli_cd} order by ord_cd
